attributes.action: bring about a policy that will ban all plastic "squeezy" bottles and bring back the beloved glass ones (see Marmite and HP Sauce for examples).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plastic bottles are not right for HP Sauce and Marmite, they should be presented in a glass bottle/jar - it's only right.  And with the lid at the top, not at the bottom.  We the undersigned deserve this at least.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
